languages.text: Во время варп-перелета со средних палуб пришло сообщение о странных сборищах, которые привлекают десятки офицеров. Быстрое расследование принесло плоды: один из служителей авгур-палубы объявил себя пророком и проповедует о благословенном очищении огнем. Ничем иным, как пагубным влиянием варпа, не объяснить ни странные убеждения этого человека, ни его пугающий фанатизм...

During the warp voyage, the middle decks reported strange gatherings that were attracting dozens of officers. An investigation quickly bore fruit: one of the acolytes from the augur deck has proclaimed himself a prophet and is rambling about purification by blessed fire. Only the perilous influence of the warp can explain the strange convictions and uncanny zeal of this person...
languages.original_text: Во время варп-перелета со средних палуб пришло сообщение о странных сборищах, которые привлекают десятки офицеров. Быстрое расследование принесло плоды: один из служителей авгур-палубы объявил себя пророком и проповедует о благословенном очищении огнем. Ничем иным, как пагубным влиянием варпа, не объяснить ни странные убеждения этого человека, ни его пугающий фанатизм...

traits.locale_text: During the warp voyage a report was delivered from the middle decks. It seems there are strange gatherings that attract dozens of officers. An investigation quickly bore fruit: one of the acolytes from the augur deck proclaimed himself a prophet and is rambling about purification by blessed fire. Only the perilous influence of the warp can explain the strange convictions and uncanny zeal of this person...

languages.text: 亚空间航行期间，中层甲板传来了报告，说说有几十名军官参加了古怪的聚会。调查很快就有了结果，扫描甲板上的某位侍仆宣称自己是先知，夸夸其谈什么净化， 什么祝福之火。只有亚空间的有害影响才能解释这个人的古怪信念与诡异的热忱……
languages.original_text: During the warp voyage, the middle decks reported strange gatherings that were attracting dozens of officers. Only the perilous influence of the warp can explain the strange convictions and uncanny zeal of this person...

languages.text: Durante el viaje por la disformidad, las cubiertas intermedias han informado de extrañas concentraciones que atraían a decenas de oficiales. La investigación no tardó en dar sus frutos: uno de los acólitos de la cubierta de augures se ha autoproclamado profeta y está divagando sobre la purificación mediante el fuego bendito. Solo la peligrosa influencia de la disformidad puede explicar las extrañas convicciones y el insólito fanatismo de esta persona...
languages.original_text: During the warp voyage, the middle decks reported strange gatherings that were attracting dozens of officers. An investigation quickly bore fruit: one of the acolytes from the augur deck has proclaimed himself a prophet and is rambling about purification by blessed fire. Only the perilous influence of the warp can explain the strange convictions and uncanny zeal of this person...

languages.text: <歪み>を航海中、何十人もの士官が引き寄せられている奇妙な集まりがあると、中央デッキから報告があった。調査はすぐに実を結んだ。スキャナーデッキのアコライトのひとりが、自らを預言者だと謳い、祝福された炎による浄化についてベラベラと語っている。<歪み>の危険な影響しか、この者のおかしな信念と不気味な熱意の説明がつかない…
languages.original_text: During the warp voyage, the middle decks reported strange gatherings that were attracting dozens of officers. An investigation quickly bore fruit: one of the acolytes from the augur deck has proclaimed himself a prophet and is rambling about purification by blessed fire. Only the perilous influence of the warp can explain the strange convictions and uncanny zeal of this person...

languages.text: Pendant le voyage dans le Warp, les ponts intermédiaires signalent d'étranges rassemblements ayant attiré des dizaines d'officiers. L'enquête porte rapidement ses fruits : l'un des acolytes du pont des augures s'est autoproclamé prophète et raconte à qui veut l'entendre que la purification ne peut se faire que par le feu consacré. Il n'y a qu'une seule explication, c'est l'insidieuse influence du Warp qui lui a insufflé ces étranges convictions et sa ferveur inattendue...
languages.original_text: During the warp voyage, the middle decks reported strange gatherings that were attracting dozens of officers. An investigation quickly bore fruit: one of the acolytes from the augur deck has proclaimed himself a prophet and is rambling about purification by blessed fire. Only the perilous influence of the warp can explain the strange convictions and uncanny zeal of this person...

L'enquête porte rapidement ses fruits : l'un des acolytes du pont des augures s'est autoproclamé prophète et raconte à qui veut l'entendre que la purification ne peut se faire que par le feu consacré. languages.text: Während der Warpreise berichteten die Mitteldecks von seltsamen Versammlungen, die Dutzende von Offizieren anzogen. Eine Ermittlung trug schnell Früchte: Einer der Akolythen vom Augurendeck hat sich zum Propheten erklärt und faselt von einer Läuterung durch gesegnetes Feuer. Nur der gefährliche Einfluss des Warps kann die seltsamen Überzeugungen und den unheimlichen Eifer dieser Person erklären ...
languages.original_text: During the warp voyage, the middle decks reported strange gatherings that were attracting dozens of officers. Only the perilous influence of the warp can explain the strange convictions and uncanny zeal of this person...

languages.text: Öteboyut yolculuğu sırasında orta güvertelerde onlarca subayın katıldığı, garip toplantılar rapor edildi. Yapılan soruşturma hızla sonuç verdi: Alamet güvertesindeki havarilerden birisi, kendini peygamber ilan etmiş ve kutsal ateşle arınmaya dair vaazlar veriyormuş. Bu şahsın tuhaf inançları ve bağnazlığı, yalnızca öteboyutun tehlikeli etkisiyle açıklanabilir...
languages.original_text: During the warp voyage, the middle decks reported strange gatherings that were attracting dozens of officers.
